storyInfo:
Tomimi has to leave for a bit, so Gavial and the Doctor go to Inam's tribe to find the missing Croissant.
When talking with Inam, her tribe falls under attack by none other than Utage.

attributes.content: Doctor, we're pretty deep in the rainforest now.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: It's a lot more humid here, and the trees get way denser too.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Watch your footing. Don't trip.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: There's a tribe up ahead. Let's go take a look.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: *Yawn*... It's so boring here... I'm gonna take a nap...
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Inam!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Gavial? I heard you fought Zumama at the festival and got your ass handed to you. What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Well, news sure gets to you fast, Inam.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I gotta say, I thought Tomimi was pulling my leg when she said you're a tribal leader now, but here you are.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: It wasn't my decision. What can I do if they all want to follow me?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: So why didn't you come to the ceremony?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Doctor, this is Inam, the girl Tomimi mentioned before.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Whoa, a real, live outsider.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Is this one of your friends from out there? Kinda shy, huh?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: The Doctor just doesn't talk much.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Yo! Gavial, you've got a pretty cheerful friend there. Just like you.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Hm? Inam, how come you know Sargonian too?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Well, officially, I'm the Messenger for these parts here.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Messenger? Huh?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: You... whatever. I can tell you at least know what a Messenger is.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Not like the boneheads here. Even if I told them, they wouldn't have any idea what it actually means.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Wait up. When did you become a Messenger?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I've always been a Messenger...
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: We're still technically within Sargon territory. You can't possibly think they know absolutely nothing about this whole area?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Huh? They don't though?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Of course not! As far as I know, a couple centuries ago, this actually used to be a Sargon mining colony.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: When the Catastrophe happened, the whole nomadic city moved away, and they ended up abandoning the mine.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: The people who got left behind and the ones who came back later are our ancestors here.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: And I guess the higher-ups out there are thinking about repositioning those newer cities here to start putting the mine to use again.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Like that time some ten years ago. You know the one.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Oh, you mean that one time? Both Zumama and I saw it. That's also the day she started acting really strange.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Oh yeah? Well, I don't really know why they gave up on the idea. They probably had someone survey the area and realized the mine didn't have much value at all.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: If they did park a city here, it's gonna end up pretty far away from all the other ones.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: I heard this stretch of no man's land used to be a pretty prosperous place. No idea how long ago, though.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Well, whatever. Let's talk about something else. I mean, I was like, uh...? How old was I again? Whatever, they sent me here after I became a Messenger.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Oh.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Sheesh, I don't get to talk about this very often. Can't you at least pretend to be a little interested?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Nope, sounds like a pain. But if you're the Messenger here, how come I haven't ever seen you leave this place?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Of course you haven't. You know how shut off we are? I've been outside to shop, but no one's ever had anything for me to mail!
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: From the day I became a Messenger to this very day, you're the only person who's still had contact with this place after you left!
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: And since I've got absolutely nothing to do, I've been trading things I buy from nearby cities to make a quick buck.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: And before you know it, I'm everybody's favorite shopkeeper, Inam.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: How about that. I never knew.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: With how you used to be, I'd be more surprised if you did...
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: But well, even though I grew up in the city, I definitely prefer living here.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: It's simple and laidback. What's not to like?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: You don't really seem all that different from the other Liberi here, either.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I'll take that as a compliment. Anyway, what are you doing here?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Let me ask you this first. What was AUS doing here? You didn't bring them here, did you?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: AUS? Of course not. Even someone like me who hardly follows that kinda stuff knows about them. I don't have that kind of pull.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: In fact, I was probably more surprised than anybody else when I saw them.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: They really were just passing by, and I was their interpreter while they were here.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Oh, I could talk about them all day. You came at just the right time. I wasn't even sure how to brag about this when nobody here knows who they are.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Check this out! I got this autographed album!
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Eh, I'll pass. I'm not a fan anyway. I just thought it was weird.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Ugh, Gavial, you've been out there so long, but your taste is just as terrible as ever.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: You wanna get your ass whooped? Whatever. The Doctor and I are on our way to Zumama's, and we figured we'd stop by and resupply here.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Alright. We could just barter like everyone here does, but since you know how things work on the outside, you can pay me with cold, hard cash.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: ...Oh, wait up, I almost forgot since you were bombarding me with all these questions. I was actually looking for you for something too.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Do you have a friend called Croissant?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Croissant? Yeah, she's with us. We've been trying to find her. Have you seen her?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: You should take a look over at the market.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Come one, come all! Freshly carved wood sculptures right here!
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Check out these ores passed down from my grandfather! Forge weapons sharper than anything you've ever seen!
attributes.name: Archosauria B

attributes.options: The market's not half bad.;......;What a lively place.

attributes.content: Haha, I was the one who taught them to peddle like that. It's something, isn't it?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Look, there's Croissant.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: In the corner of the market, Croissant is in a fierce standoff against a lone Archosauria.
Croissant gestures toward the ore her opponent is holding, and then points to the seashell in her hand. He shakes his head.
She frowns and waves her hand with a reluctant look.
She takes a rock out of her pocket and points at her seashell again. Then, she points at the ore in his hand once more. He ponders for a moment and nods.
Throughout the entire transaction, Croissant maintains a bitter expression, but the moment her trade partner turns around, her face immediately lights up with a bright smile.
Hooowee, that's a hell of an ore! What a prize!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Croissant, what are you even doing, bartering here?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Gavial, Baws! Finally! Took me ages to find y'all!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.options: You doing okay?;......;You can talk to the people here?

attributes.content: Never been better!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Ahaha. C'mon, Baws, why the face?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: I was fixin' to have Inam here take me to that Temple to look fer y'all!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Sure can't, but it ain't like you need talkin' to do business!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: I came across her a couple days ago. I could tell she's not from around here, so I brought her with me.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: This girl really knows how to do business! She doesn't speak their language, but she really knows how to speak the language of trade with my men here.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: I can see that. Croissant, have you come across anyone else?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Naw, and I asked Inam, too, but she says she ain't heard nothin' about that either.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Alright, at least you're alive and well. Now we just gotta find Utage and Blaze. I'm not too worried about Blaze. She jumped out the aircraft first, didn't even think twice. As for Utage...
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Inam, bad news. There's a group of Archosauria charging towards us!
attributes.name: Archosauria

attributes.content: What? Which tribe is it? Are they out of their minds?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Looks like the Great Wood Tribe! But they're being led by some freak with a sword!
attributes.name: Archosauria

attributes.content: Huh? A freak?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: My man says a freak with a blade is charging toward us with a horde of Archosauria. What gives?!
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Hold up, a freak carryin' a blade... Damn dagnabbit, it's gotta be Utage!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Is she with you guys? Tsk... In any case, it looks like they're here already. Gavial, and you, with the hood, come help us!
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Oh, I'm comin' with y'all!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: C'mon, dudes, let's go!
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: I mean, it's not like any of you know what I'm saying, but show 'em what you got~!
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Aha! I wasn't sure about this at first, but it's kinda fun taking these guys around to fight.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Hey, Utage, are you out of your mind? What are you even doing?!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Oh, it's Gavial. Croissant and Doctor too! Heyas!
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Who's heying ya?! Why are you attacking the village, and where'd you get these guys?!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Huh? Is this your hometown? Alright, I'll knock it off.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Get these fellers to knock it off too!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Uh, but, you know, they don't understand a word I say.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Tch... Looks like we're out of options. Let's take these idiots down.
attributes.name: Gavial
